channel.title: CVE Feed for Palo Alto Networks -- GlobalProtect App
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Palo Alto Networks -- GlobalProtect App

item.title: CVE-2023-0009|2023-07-31T20:36:04.826Z -- palo%20alto%20networks -- globalprotect%20app
item.description: A local privilege escalation (PE) vulnerability in the Palo Alto Networks GlobalProtect app on Windows enables a local user to execute programs with elevated privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-0006|2023-04-14T19:41:29.587Z -- palo%20alto%20networks -- globalprotect%20app
item.description: A local file deletion vulnerability in the Palo Alto Networks GlobalProtect app on Windows devices enables a user to delete system files from the endpoint with elevated privileges through a race condition.

item.title: CVE-2024-2432|2024-03-13T17:51:33.908Z -- palo%20alto%20networks -- globalprotect%20app
item.description: A privilege escalation (PE) vulnerability in the Palo Alto Networks GlobalProtect app on Windows devices enables a local user to execute programs with elevated privileges. However, execution requires that the local user is able to successfully exploit a race condition.

item.title: CVE-2024-2431|2024-03-13T17:51:17.735Z -- palo%20alto%20networks -- globalprotect%20app
item.description: An issue in the Palo Alto Networks GlobalProtect app enables a non-privileged user to disable the GlobalProtect app in configurations that allow a user to disable GlobalProtect with a passcode.
